org.kj.pxe.protocol.impl

Class DhcpPacketImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kj.pxe.protocol.impl.DhcpPacketImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DhcpPacket

    public class DhcpPacketImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements DhcpPacket
    Stores all of the data fields of a DHCP packet as specified by https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2131.txt. Provides getter and setter methods for all fields.

      • convertToBytes

        public byte[] convertToBytes()
        Converts the data in this packet to an array of bytes. The fields are stored in the order specified by https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2131.txt and also take up the specified amount of bytes each.
        Specified by:
        convertToBytes in interface DhcpPacket
        Returns:
        a byte array representing all of the information contained within this packet.

      • readFromBytes

        public void readFromBytes(byte[] buf)
        Does nothing. The readFromBytes method should only be used to build a specific type of packet. This is a generic that only stores data fields.
        Specified by:
        readFromBytes in interface DhcpPacket
